name: Homerun for your life ☄️
description:
Oh no! Comets! And they are going to crash down on Earth! It's a good thing we have a giant batter robot (B-453 BOT) to deflect them! Swing your bat to reflect all the comets and save Earth!!!

Controls : click on the left or the right of the screen to smash depending from where the comets are coming from ;) Use the map to prepare your smash !

Can be played with a mouse or a touch screen

On PC, you can also use the X and C keys to swing your bat

Made in 72h by WobblyHorse and Menica Folden for the Ludum Dare 51

Theme : Every 10 seconds
